name: GKCoherentNoiseSource
desc: The abstract superclass for procedural noise generators that create coherent noise.

items.name: var frequency: Double
items.desc: A value that determines the size and spacing of features in generated noise.

items.name: var octaveCount: Int
items.desc: The number of octaves of the underlying noise function to use for generating noise.

items.name: var lacunarity: Double
items.desc: The rate at which successive octaves of the noise function increase in frequency.

items.name: var seed: Int32
items.desc: The value that determines the specific configuration of noise produced by the noise source.
